eg.projects

Class SettingsWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.SettingsWindow

  • public class SettingsWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    The window that shows input options for the configuration of a project

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder
      The building of the content of SettingsWindow with selectable input options.
